RumorFact.Text: Ore mined on Timber Hearth was treated at a forge on Hollow's Lantern.
A Nomai computer reported increased volcanic activity and unstable lava levels on Hollow's Lantern.
There is a Nomai recorder perched precariously on one of the fragments of ore floating in the pool of lava.

ExploreFact.Text: A supernova radiates immense amounts of heat.
The Nomai working at this site debated if the ore being tested at this site was truly capable of withstanding a supernova, but data from their elders assuaged these concerns.
